trans-unit.source: Gallery Search Syntax
trans-unit.target: Gallery Search Syntax

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Gallery offers a text searchbox where you can use words, phrases and keyword expressions to narrow down search results.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell Gallery offers a text searchbox where you can use words, phrases and keyword expressions to narrow down search results.

trans-unit.source: Search by Keywords
trans-unit.target: Search by Keywords

trans-unit.source: Search will do its best effort to find relevant documents containing all 3 keywords, and return matching documents.
trans-unit.target: Search will do its best effort to find relevant documents containing all 3 keywords, and return matching documents.

trans-unit.source: Search using Phrases and keywords
trans-unit.target: Search using Phrases and keywords

trans-unit.source: Entering a phrase between quotation marks ("") change the search to look for the particular phrase instead of separate keywords.
trans-unit.target: Entering a phrase between quotation marks ("") change the search to look for the particular phrase instead of separate keywords.

trans-unit.source: Matching documents should usually contain the exact phrase "azure sql", including variations on capitalization e.g. "Azure SQL", and also usually contain the word 'deployment'.
trans-unit.target: Matching documents should usually contain the exact phrase "azure sql", including variations on capitalization e.g. "Azure SQL", and also usually contain the word 'deployment'.

trans-unit.source: Filtering on fields
trans-unit.target: Filtering on fields

trans-unit.source: You can search for a specific item ID (or 'Id' or 'id'), or certain other fields by prefixing search terms with the field name.
trans-unit.target: You can search for a specific item ID (or 'Id' or 'id'), or certain other fields by prefixing search terms with the field name.

trans-unit.source: Currently the searchable fields are 'Id', 'Version', 'Tags', 'Author', 'Owner', 'Functions', 'Cmdlets', 'DscResources' and 'PowerShellVersion'.
trans-unit.target: Currently the searchable fields are 'Id', 'Version', 'Tags', 'Author', 'Owner', 'Functions', 'Cmdlets', 'DscResources' and 'PowerShellVersion'.

trans-unit.source: [What's the difference between ID and Title?
trans-unit.target: [What's the difference between ID and Title?

trans-unit.source: ID is the name you use in the console.
trans-unit.target: ID is the name you use in the console.

trans-unit.source: Title is what is shown at the top of the item page in search results.]
trans-unit.target: Title is what is shown at the top of the item page in search results.]

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: Examples

trans-unit.source: finds items with "PSReadline" or "AzureRM.Profile" in their ID field respectively.
trans-unit.target: finds items with "PSReadline" or "AzureRM.Profile" in their ID field respectively.

trans-unit.source: is another way to find items with "AzureRM.Profile" in their ID field.
trans-unit.target: is another way to find items with "AzureRM.Profile" in their ID field.

trans-unit.source: The 'Id' filter is a substring match, so if you search for the following:
trans-unit.target: The 'Id' filter is a substring match, so if you search for the following:

trans-unit.source: You'll get results like 'AzureRM.Profile' and 'Azure.Storage'.
trans-unit.target: You'll get results like 'AzureRM.Profile' and 'Azure.Storage'.

trans-unit.source: You can also search for multiple keywords in a single field.
trans-unit.target: You can also search for multiple keywords in a single field.

trans-unit.source: Or mix and match fields.
trans-unit.target: Or mix and match fields.

trans-unit.source: And you can perform phrase searches:
trans-unit.target: And you can perform phrase searches:

trans-unit.source: To search all items with DSC tag.
trans-unit.target: To search all items with DSC tag.

trans-unit.source: To search all items with the specified function.
trans-unit.target: To search all items with the specified function.

trans-unit.source: To search all items with the specified cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To search all items with the specified cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: To search all items with the specified DSC Resource name.
trans-unit.target: To search all items with the specified DSC Resource name.

trans-unit.source: To search all items with the specified PowerShellVersion
trans-unit.target: To search all items with the specified PowerShellVersion

trans-unit.source: Finally, if you use a field we don't support, such as 'commands', we'll just ignore it and search all the fields.
trans-unit.target: Finally, if you use a field we don't support, such as 'commands', we'll just ignore it and search all the fields.
